name: IsGLB.exists_between_self_add
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedAddCommGroup α
s : Set α
a ε : α
h : IsGLB s a
hε : LT.lt 0 ε
⊢ Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem s b) (And (LE.le a b) (LT.lt b (HAdd.hAdd a ε)))
decl:
theorem IsGLB.exists_between_self_add (h : IsGLB s a) (hε : 0 < ε) : ∃ b ∈ s, a ≤ b ∧ b < a + ε :=
  h.exists_between <| lt_add_of_pos_right _ hε

name: IsGLB.exists_between_self_add'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedAddCommGroup α
s : Set α
a ε : α
h : IsGLB s a
h₂ : Not (Membership.mem s a)
hε : LT.lt 0 ε
⊢ Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem s b) (And (LT.lt a b) (LT.lt b (HAdd.hAdd a ε)))
decl:
theorem IsGLB.exists_between_self_add' (h : IsGLB s a) (h₂ : a ∉ s) (hε : 0 < ε) :
    ∃ b ∈ s, a < b ∧ b < a + ε :=
  h.exists_between' h₂ <| lt_add_of_pos_right _ hε

name: IsLUB.exists_between_sub_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedAddCommGroup α
s : Set α
a ε : α
h : IsLUB s a
hε : LT.lt 0 ε
⊢ Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem s b) (And (LT.lt (HSub.hSub a ε) b) (LE.le b a))
decl:
theorem IsLUB.exists_between_sub_self (h : IsLUB s a) (hε : 0 < ε) : ∃ b ∈ s, a - ε < b ∧ b ≤ a :=
  h.exists_between <| sub_lt_self _ hε

name: IsLUB.exists_between_sub_self'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedAddCommGroup α
s : Set α
a ε : α
h : IsLUB s a
h₂ : Not (Membership.mem s a)
hε : LT.lt 0 ε
⊢ Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem s b) (And (LT.lt (HSub.hSub a ε) b) (LT.lt b a))
decl:
theorem IsLUB.exists_between_sub_self' (h : IsLUB s a) (h₂ : a ∉ s) (hε : 0 < ε) :
    ∃ b ∈ s, a - ε < b ∧ b < a :=
  h.exists_between' h₂ <| sub_lt_self _ hε
